name: Nickelodeon Dance
description:
Gamers big and small will twist, shimmy and shake to 30 songs sung by Nickelodeon friends including theme songs and Nickelodeon hits like "We Did It," "Al Rescate," and "Here We Go." Popular favorites like "Dancing in the Street," "We Got the Beat," and "Rhythm is Gonna Get You!" ensure fun for the entire family!

Features

*1st dance videogame featuring your favorite Nickelodeon friends!
*Developed with an Emmy- recognized kids’ choreographer!
*Includes a work-out feature for heart healthy activity!
*30 songs sung by your favorite Nickelodeon characters!
